definition: To transport or carry someone or something along with oneself, typically used when referring to taking someone or something along on a journey or trip.

examples.english: Can you please take me with you?

examples.german: Ich nehme immer mein Handy mit.
examples.english: I always take my phone with me.

examples.german: Kannst du mir etwas zu essen mitnehmen?
examples.english: Can you bring me something to eat?
Don't forget to take the trash with you.

examples.german: Kannst du mir einen Kaffee mitnehmen?
examples.english: Can you get me a coffee to go?
